abstract: Russian figure skaters Ksenia Stolbova and Fedor Klimov win Grand Prix Final pairs title in Barcelona, Spain.
lead_paragraph: The figure skaters Ksenia Stolbova and Fedor Klimov of Russia avenged last year’s loss to the world champions Meagan Duhamel and Eric Radford of Canada by winning the Grand Prix Final pairs title.

headline.print_headline: Sports Briefings | Winter Sports; Russians Take Pairs Title

snippet: The figure skaters Ksenia Stolbova and Fedor Klimov of Russia avenged last year’s loss to the world champions Meagan Duhamel and Eric Radford of Canada by winning the Grand Prix Final pairs title.
